Explanation of field: Country were participants were surveyed by WHR and WVS
Calculated score of overall secular values comprised of the sub-indices: SKEPTICISM, RELATIVISM, DISBELIEF, DEFIANCE
Calculated score representing trust in army, police, courts
Calculated score representing thoughts on societal norms
Calculated score representing religious importance and practice
Calculated score representing respect for authority, national pride, and devoutness
Calculated score of emancipative values comprised of the sub-indices: AUTONOMY, EQUALITY, CHOICE, VOICE
Calculated score representing thoughts on independence, imagination, and obedience
Calculated score representing gender equality in work, politics, and educaiton
Calculated score representing acceptance of homosexuality, abortion, divorce
Calculated score representing thoughts on having a voice
Calculated score representing happiness on a scale of 0-10 with 10 being the happiest
